A deadly fire on Roosevelt Island resulted in one fatality and injuries to three firefighters, while NYC declared a 'code blue' for homeless outreach amid freezing temperatures, and a major car theft ring was dismantled with eight indictments.

### Risks & Alerts

- One person dead in Roosevelt Island building fire, 3 firefighters injured. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiswFBVV95cUxOUHRfSnNRdlNpelVfczVYRHhBbFJGVnI3aU1pb2ZvN1UwOE9tNFFJdC1OSExnbTJ4WlMzRzJKQXJMUkRmOUxhZ1d0OU1GeHpYcVJ1bDFjVHFSVFNTaXp0OXdiOUxRV3NaS3VGUm1wVDJOdkJWLXpzSnVMMFN5QV80U1p2NTVtX2NySFNpUzJUaTNkV2NUX2hVRnVsV192WUI2RzVvSTBaSktQcXBJRnhDNDF2cw?oc=5)
- NYC declares 'code blue' for homeless outreach due to freezing wind chills in forecast. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMisAFBVV95cUxOZlVXZ2d0ZEdvazlZY1JOX3M0OXZzUk10c3ZkZV8xcElvWVJFZFFNUTBlckZFMW91dXJJaGFhVDhzM05tc0pzcFdlWlhQVFlsSGs4U1BkV1FjY2tkTFJCTnBrUWJWSGVyVjR1aTRGYUQ0aDZlR0RpVnN6ZmVHWlJwYnRPblY5bTZpUXJaT2l0YWhrVDlMYkpWWWVRMm4wTG9sVDRWeDJHMEVnYUpxYlU5YQ?oc=5)
